channel.title: Help pl0x
channel.description:
hello i need help with a few things, if you know how to help me with ANY of these things PLEASE post!!
1. following doesnt work, whenever you try to follow someone it says "you are now following playername" and it just moves your character beside the one you tried to follow and then your character sits there.
2. range in my server is messed up, first, the mage bow has no special attack, second the dark bow only shoots one arrow lol... and third when you try to range someone your character moves from where you are to like 3 steps away from the person you are attacking.
3. i would like skillcape emotes added, i know this is possible because i found in client.java where it said something like: "a magic skillcape emote" and it had one for most of the skills, i just want to know if i can make a command like ::cape so that if you type ::cape and your wearing a skilcape, it will do that cape's emote.
If you can help please help me!!!
Thanks - Maxim!

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Maxim706 Maxim706
item.description:
@Maxim706 wrote:

hello i need help with a few things, if you know how to help me with ANY of these things PLEASE post!!

  1. following doesnt work, whenever you try to follow someone it says “you are now following playername” and it just moves your character beside the one you tried to follow and then your character sits there.

  2. range in my server is messed up, first, the mage bow has no special attack, second the dark bow only shoots one arrow lol… and third when you try to range someone your character moves from where you are to like 3 steps away from the person you are attacking.

  3. i would like skillcape emotes added, i know this is possible because i found in client.java where it said something like: “a magic skillcape emote” and it had one for most of the skills, i just want to know if i can make a command like ::cape so that if you type ::cape and your wearing a skilcape, it will do that cape’s emote.

If you can help please help me!!!

Thanks - Maxim!
